reviews.review_msg: I have had Shiva for Math 105 and math 108, and she is one of the best math teachers i have ever had. Shiva is a very kind, knowledgeable , and a helpful person. She always makes time to help students and has the best advice for understanding math subjects. I would definitely recommend Shiva.

He teaches well and explaines concepts. I know that becaus e I am not a bright student and I still got an A. Not that he gives out A's for free, but with him, I actually understood the concept of Math!
